Real moments

The social media platform where authenticity isn't optional; it's everything. Share only what you capture in the moment with no fake content, and no curated feeds.

Why MyCandid is Different from Other Social Media Platforms

We're building a platform that puts humans first.

Capture-Only Social Media

Share only what you capture directly in the app. No uploads from gallery, no pre-edited content. Just authentic, in-the-moment photos and videos.

100% Authentic Content

No manipulated photos. Just real, unfiltered moments from your life that create genuine connections.

Real Human Connections

Connect with friends and family through genuine, spontaneous moments. Build meaningful relationships through authentic sharing.

Privacy-First Social Network

Your moments are yours. Control who sees your content, when they see it, and how long it stays visible.

Take Back Control of Your Social Media Life

Tired of the endless scroll through generated, fake content? MyCandid is different. We believe social media should bring us closer together, not make us feel more distant or inadequate.

By limiting what you can share to only what you capture in the moment, we're creating a space where authenticity thrives and genuine human connections flourish. No more pressure to maintain a perfect online persona.
